En.Text: There are not enough words of thanks, tears of joy and emotions tear from the inside. I am proud of you PEOPLE who, despite all obstacles, illnesses, mistrust, even insults, do not fold your hands and help those who have faced this terrible disease. A huge THANK YOU from me and my son To EDUARD, IHOR, SERGI and all the PEOPLE involved in this HUGE CASE. Unfortunately, we do not know everyone by name, but I ask God for all those who help. Special thanks to Ms. Schmidt-Schmiedebach for the help provided and concern for each of us. May you 100 times more good will come back.

En.Title: Ludmila
En.Text: Many thanks to Eduard and the entire team, which helps our children with what is necessary for a normal life. Thank you, it is scary to imagine our life without modern devices for measuring sugar (pounds), especially when a child does not feel high and low sugars. Libra is our eyes. Thank goodness we can see sugar painlessly. May all your big plans come true!!! And God always protects!!!

En.Title: Vladlena
En.Text: The whole family is infinitely grateful üß° For the sensor, for the drops, the sugar substitute and for the past help as a Libra 2 reader! Because you won't appreciate all the benefits right away, it takes time) Many people are scared of measuring mg/dL and numbers per 100. A few days and we were clearly oriented! Such an irreplaceable thing especially with a very young child, because now it is possible to leave the grandchild with the grandmother and not leave your phone! Because the little one just doesn't have it... Of course, a separate "cherry on the cake" is a notification about a low or too high glucose level, because the little one won't tell, especially when she's sleeping! And no calibrations! Everything shows right away üëç Little Lily's fingers are really resting üß° Just a HUGE thank you to the entire foundation and of course to Sergey and Eduard personally! Just because you are! And this is how you help our diabetics, young and old, despite all the negativity!üôè

En.Title: Olena M
En.Text:
I received the first, very valuable, absolutely necessary for me, free help from the Charitable Fund for the Assistance and Rehabilitation of Diabetes Patients: a glucometer, a test strip, vitamins and a sugar substitute.
I sincerely thank the Foundation, all its volunteers, the Medico company, the Malva Voluntary Association of Ukraine and Banko Farmaceutico. I was pleasantly surprised by the conscientious attitude of all the Foundation's volunteers to the fulfillment of this charitable mission (a special thank you to Natalya, the administrator).
Thanks to you, I now have my own free blood glucose meter and lots of test strips. After all, it was quite difficult to allocate funds for the independent purchase of the device, and especially test strips from my small pension.
Thanks to your help, I will now be able to control my blood sugar on my own, which is very important. And the sugar substitute will help you enjoy self-made sweet dishes, which, due to the disease, you can enjoy very rarely. And the vitamin complex will support the general state of health.
I wish everyone peace and health.

Extraordinary event! Received what was promised - free of charge, and so quickly!
Thanks to you our kind, good, caring compatriots - Eduard, Igor, Nataliya, Iryna, Serhiy and your entire team!
We are also grateful to the partners of the Foundation - the Malva Association of Ukraine and Banko Farmaceutico.
We wish you to have business, relationships with people who and YOU - active, friendly, conscientious, not indifferent.
With great respect, BABAK family üåπ

I have not seen any charity fund to help diabetics in Ukraine, except yours! We are IDPs, the housing is occupied and destroyed. You have helped us a lot. Thank you very much! May God grant you strength, health, peace and Victory! Do not give up because of disgruntled wards, you are doing a great job! Thank you very much! Keep yourselves! Everything will be Ukraine!

En.Title: Valentina
En.Text: Good afternoon, dear admins and personally Igor, Alex, as well as dear group. I am very grateful for the sugar substitute and vitamins for diabetes. I received it, I was very happy, very grateful for your concern and care for us diabetics !! especially since I could not pick up either the glucometer or my stevia from Bakhmut. You are very attentive to us. You know that sometimes we also want something sweet. God sees your work and will appreciate it, just as we appreciate it by 10 points. You have already provided and will continue to provide thousands of people with diabetes with your work. Thanks a lot. Peace to all of us!!!!

En.Title: Nadija
En.Text: I received a sensor today. I sincerely thank all the employees of the foundation for what you are, for your work, for your patience, for your worries, for the sleepless nights, for not leaving diabetics and helping them, your work is invaluable. During the 27 years of experience with diabetes, there were many things, but there were always people on the way who extended a helping hand. Now your fund has helped me a lot. Good health to you and God's grace. THANK YOU VERY MUCH

En.Title: Olena
En.Text: Thank you very much to the Foundation for the help, and in particular to Eduard and Serhiy for the timely delivery of the sensor to my daughter in the border town of Sumy, thank you very much to Mrs. Schmidt Schmiedebach, who helps our children who are suffering from type 1 diabetes. You make our children's lives much easier. You and the whole team Mr. Eduard and he himself are our guardian angels, who protect ours by sending them the necessary nutrients that this disease needs. Thank you all very much for the sensor, for the sugar substitute, which we need to prepare various goodies that lift our spirits, as well as for the vitamins. which are necessary to strengthen immunity. We wish you all good health, happiness and God's blessing, may the Lord protect you üôèüôèüôèüôè‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüíõüíô Everything will be Ukraine!!! En.Title: Oksana Sugak
En.Text: Good day. We received a package with Libra 2, according to the 50/50 program. We sincerely thank the foundation and all employees for this opportunity to purchase a sensor. Thanks to it, we can see a clear picture of our sugars and react quickly and in time to the situation, be it hypoglycemia or hyperglycemia. With Libra 2, the child can sleep peacefully at night, if anything, the alarm will sound and wake him up. We thank Eduard, Serhiy and all the employees who are involved in such a good cause. We wish everyone good health and a peaceful sky above our heads. üíõüíô

En.Title: Alina
En.Text: Sincere thanks for such an incredible opportunity to get a sensor under the 50/50 program. üôèüôèüôè This is a great help in times like this. Each of us understands what diabetes is and how difficult it is when it is in your bloodstream. 7 years ago, when we got sick, such a wonderful device was like some kind of fantasy! And now the fingers are not so tired. üòÉüòÉüòÉ. A low bow to the entire team, who work tirelessly, who spend so much effort, time, and finances, often neglecting their affairs and families, but helping all of us ‚ô•Ô∏è. You are incredible people!!!! No, you are not people, you are superheroes!!! Thank you!

A low bow to the entire team, who work tirelessly, who spend so much effort, time, and finances, often neglecting their affairs and families, but helping all of us ‚ô•Ô∏è. You are incredible people!!!! No, you are not people, you are superheroes!!! Thank you!

She is like a breath of fresh air when difficulties pile up and do not let you breathe! I am glad, I am proud that there are such sensitive, generous-hearted and caring people in the world! I ask you to accept my sincere gratitude and good wishes for health, peace, never to lose the kindness of your soul and mercy.

En.Title: Larisa
En.Text: Thank you all so much. For the fact that during the war, when it is hard for everyone, you really help. Do incredible things. Spending your strength and health to help others. Looking for and seeking help. Such people will raise Ukraine. Good always comes back a hundredfold. Good attracts good. We Ukrainians are strong and self-sufficient, strong-willed. When you look at our defenders, you are full of pride. These are our brave boys and girls. Look at the volunteers. These are strong-minded and purposeful boys and girls. Well, there is no other nation like us in the whole world. The whole universe is blue-yellow. We are strong, indomitable, strong-willed. And we will defeat that poor army. And God willing, we will defeat that damned diabetes. And whoever doesn't like it, let him go another way. There are things, actions - priceless. Every person has a gift. The gift of being human. But not all people keep it, it gets lost somewhere... and you haven't lost it. Hold fast this gift. To the evil of all enemies!))) Good health and success in all your endeavors. Glory to Ukraine!

En.Title: Ludmila
En.Text: Good day. Today I received 2 pounds. Happiness has no limits. I want to thank Eduard, Igor and everyone, every person who helps this charitable project. In our difficult time, when more and more children need financial help, it is difficult to find people who are able to perceive other people's problems as their own, and how wonderful that such people are still there is. A huge thank you and a low bow to you!!! It is a great happiness for us to be able to control sugars in children. Someone is happy with a new toy, a dress, but for us the best gift is a libra, because the life and health of my children depend on it. Today is World Diabetes Day. I wish everyone that diabetes becomes curable!!! For now, let's stick to health-supporting drugs. Thanks for creating this group! And may God grant that the good that you give to people will return to you a hundredfold!!!

En.Title: Hanna Lutsenko
En.Text: From the bottom of my heart, I want to thank you very much for your help. You did not turn your back on me and did not spare your strength, your time, to help me and my son. I ask you to accept my sincere gratitude and good wishes for health, peace above your head, comfort in the house, good things in the family and incredible happiness in each new day. Thank you very much, when the money comes I will send you a big thank you.
